title: Blitz Bowl Dwarves
description: Like the human team, a little overboard on depth of colour, really proud of how shiny the armour looks though. Also pretty happy with the tattoos and beard colours, very fun to paint.
colours: Blue Armour: Thousand Suns Blue, Nuln Oil all over, glaze Thousand Suns Blue near edges, edge highlight Thousand Suns Blue, Ahriman Blue, Fenrisian Grey
Orange Hair: Wild Rider Red to make painting orange possible. Trollslayer Orange completely covering red, Carroburg Crimson all over, highlight Trollslayer Orange
Dark Grey Hair: Eshin Grey, Nuln Oil all over, highlight Eshin Grey and Dawnstone
Light Grey Hair: Dawnstone, Nuln Oil all over, highlight Dawnstone and Administratum Grey
Dark Brown Hair: Dryad Bark, Agrax Earthshade all over, highlight Dryad Bark and Gorthor Brown
Light Brown Hair: Mournfang Brown, Agrax Earthshade all over, highlight Mournfang Brown and Skrag Brown
Blonde Hair: Zandri Dust, Agrax Earthshade all over, highlight Zandri Dust and Ushabti Bone
Gems: Waaagh Flesh, Nuln Oil all over, highlight Warboss Green and Skarsnik Green
Beer Foam: Zandri Dust, Reikland Fleshshade all over, highlight Zandri Dust
Steel: Leadbelcher, Nuln Oil all over, highlight Stormhost Silver
Leather: Dryad Bark, Agrax Earthshade all over, highlight Gorthor Brown
Skulls: Zandri Dust, Seraphim Sepia all over, highlight Ushabti Bone and Screaming Skull
Grass: Waaagh Flesh, Biel-tan Green all over, highlight Warboss Green and Skarsnik Green
Ball: Mournfang Brown, Agrax Earthshade all over, highlight Skrag Brown
Base: Vallejo White Pumice just to cover slots and make a little texture, Mechanicus Standard Grey, Nuln Oil all over, highlight Dawnstone
